EmailTemplate.name: test2
EmailTemplate.subject: Greetings {!AcctSeed__Project__c.AcctSeed__Account__c} From Legend Boats!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello again {!AcctSeed__Project__c.AcctSeed__Account__c},
Our mission is to create memories, and we take ownership of our shortcomings.
We understand you recently had a less than an ideal experience with your Boat Purchase, but we hope your Legend Customer Experience Specialist was able to address your concerns and make things right.
Just to be sure, we'd love your feedback!
